name: OpenbetAI
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Multichain betting platform with AI secured protection, OpenbetAI offers a plethora of games to suit every taste.

OpenbetAI was launched on the Arbitrum chain on the 1st March 2023, originally known as Offisde but rebranded and improved to remain competitive in changing crypto market conditions.

OpenBet offers the most complete GambleFi experience. Pitching not one, but two casinos under one roof.
Starting off with an AI infused fully fledged seamless web3 casino with a cutting edge sports betting platform, 1000s of slots, and enough live games for all enthusiasts. 
50% casino revenue distributed monthly to all holders.
